title: Lantern of the Serpent ward skin dissappeared???
body:
So like, i unlocked the lantern of the serpent ward skin through hextech crafting a few months ago now i am unable to see or select it in the ward select menu, for both LCU and the Legacy client
does anyone know what happened, has it been disabled or...?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is more than likely related to a current ongoing issue where some ward skins may not be visible in your client.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224867827--August-9-We-re-aware-of-an-issue-where-some-ward-skins-don-t-appear-or-prevent-the-ward-skin-selection-box-from-appearing-

This should be resolved soon.
